parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "MPI",
  "details": {
    "software": [
      "Docker",
      "Nvidia-docker",
      "SLURM",
      "MPI",
      "Horovod",
      "NCCL"
    ],
    "resources": {
      "partition": "mlperf",
      "nodes": 1,
      "wall_time": "12:00:00",
      "memory": "all available",
      "tasks_per_node": 8,
      "threads_per_core": 2,
      "cores_per_socket": 20,
      "overcommit": true
    },
    "docker_options": [
      "--rm",
      "--net=host",
      "--uts=host",
      "--ipc=host",
      "--ulimit stack=67108864",
      "--ulimit memlock=-1",
      "--security-opt seccomp=unconfined"
    ],
    "mpi_options": [
      "--allow-run-as-root",
      "--tag-output",
      "--bind-to none",
      "-x EXTRA_PARAMS=\"${EXTRA_PARAMS}\"",
      "-x HOROVOD_MPI_THREADS_DISABLE=1",
      "-x NCCL_LL_THRESHOLD=0",
      "-x NCCL_DEBUG=INFO",
      "-x NCCL_NET_GDR_READ=1",
      "-x NCCL_SOCKET_IFNAME=^docker0,bond0,lo"
    ]
  }
}
```
